bug.author: tafsiri
bug.summary: confusion matrix renders incorrectly if non diagonal is all zero
bug.description: if the diagonal is not shaded and the rest of the cells are zero the conf matrix will render like below. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26408/48576593-f37b5800-e8e2-11e8-81a1-35d74038d380.png></denchmark-link>
